item.title: I have d claws but how i make it att 4 times?(method included)
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

well i added d claws and everything but it only attacks two timesâ€¦ and this is the method

[code] public void DCSpecial() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664) {
setAnimation(2068);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(300);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(300);
SpecialDelay -= 3;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(300);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(2068);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;
    }
}[/code]
